de.fhtw.xgl.interpreter
Interface CallbackHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExampleCallbackHandler
public interface CallbackHandler

Defines the connection with the application logic. A class connecting GUI and logic must implement this interface.
GUI-events are delivered through the method handleCallback(Widget widget).

Author:
Sebastian Heide

Method Summary
 void handleCallback(Widget widget)
          Handels the callback triggered by the specified Widget.
 

Method Detail

handleCallback

public void handleCallback(Widget widget)
Handels the callback triggered by the specified Widget.

Parameters:
widget - the callback's source
